data.title: Pat O'Brien's – Having Fun Since 1933
data.meta_description:
Pat O'Brien's New Orleans hours of operation: 
Wednesday, Thursday & Sunday: Noon - Midnight. Friday & Saturday: Noon - 2AM. Monday, Tuesday: CLOSED. 
Piano Lounge: Wednesday, Thursday and Sunday 530PM to Midnight. Friday & Saturday 1PM to 1AM
data.text:
Pat O’Brien’s New Orleans hours of operation:

Wednesday, Thursday & Sunday: Noon – Midnight. Friday & Saturday: Noon – 2AM. Monday, Tuesday: CLOSED.

Piano Lounge: Wednesday, Thursday and Sunday 530PM to Midnight. Friday & Saturday 1PM to 1AM

The Restaurant will be closed July 10th and 11th for carriageway repairs.

“We are proud and honored to accept the Louisiana Restaurant Association 2022 inaugural icon of the year award. On behalf of the entire Pat O’ Brien’s family,

we thank the LRA, and appreciate the recognition” – Shelly Oechsner Waguespack, 3rd Generation Owner & President
